task.summary: Default task
Time to start working on the titlebar
Updating Activities for Information and Case of the Week
Finished first somewhat done information page with small glitches in emailButton
About to change InfoLayout
Taylor came over, so stopping work for ripsticking
Got the MainActivity to behave normally when switching out the image to the fragment and when building a single main activity.
Created object for CasoDelSemana
Finished retrieving Case of the week, next step is to add it to an Async task and create a UI for it
Created fragment_layout for caso_fragment
About to change the hard-coded fragment to a dynamically loaded fragment.
About to change the main activity to show both casos and mensajes
CaseOfTheWeek is working well datawise
Changed everything to a tablayout instead of a menu
HomePage Tabs/Picture looking good except for the nine-patch image
Changed action bar at bottom to FABs
App finally looks good as is on at least on size and screen density

Almost finished everything. Just need to refactor strings, dimens, etc. to res directory and shorten/rename some functions. Also need to make all layouts work for 2.7, 3.7, 4.5, 5, 5.9, ec. in screens.
[NOT FINISHED QUITE YET] Refactoring the entire codebase to be easily understood and easily debuggable.
[STILL NOT FINISHED QUITE YET] Refactoring the entire codebase to be easily understood and easily debuggable.
Finished everything except making floatingActionButtonBar colorPrimaryDark, some layout margin adjustments, organizing/checking res directory and checking that layouts look good at all screen sizes.
Created finished product on small size screen
Made the small-size android app have a landscape orientation
Finished Product: Just need to double check and upload to the app store
Finished First Draft
